title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 621.2 - Amount
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 621.2 - Amount

State Regulations

The amount of the subsistence allowance shall be five
dollars per day. However, if the training facility furnishes lodgings and meals
to trainees at a rate of four dollars or less per day, the subsistence
allowance shall not exceed the amount charged by the facility plus a sum of one
dollar per day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
621.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
